LanguageData.NymphsJoin_desc: ニンフをコロニーに参加させますか？
LanguageData.STD_FromFloors_desc: 有効にすると、性病持ちとのセックス以外に、環境からも性病が発症します。
LanguageData.PrisonersBeating_desc: Will comfort prisoners get beaten in the acts?
LanguageData.OffspringLookLikeTheirMother_desc: 生まれてくる子供がどのくらいの確率で母親に似るか。
LanguageData.OffspringIsHuman_desc: Percent chance the offspring will be human
LanguageData.PregnantCoeffecientForHuman_desc: Percent multiplier applied to women's pregnant chance
LanguageData.PregnantCoeffecientForAnimals_desc: Percent multiplier applied to female animals' pregnant chance
LanguageData.UseParentMethod_desc: Use either the parent weighting or the species weighting when creating offspring
LanguageData.SexFreeForAllAge: 自由にセックスを行うようになる年齢
LanguageData.SexFreeForAllAge_desc: Pawns younger than the free-for-all age will only have sex with others within 2 biological years of their own age
LanguageData.SexMinimumAge: セックスを行う最低年齢
LanguageData.SexMinimumAge_desc: Pawns must be this old to have sex at all (should be lower or equal to free-for-all age)
LanguageData.CommandBedSetAsWhoreDesc: このベッドを売春に使いますか
LanguageData.RJW_Opportunistic_Infection_Message: {0} has developed an infection due to the weakened immune system.
LanguageData.RJW_Poisoned_by_Rimming_Message: {0} has gotten food poisoning by rimming {1}
LanguageData.RJW_Syphilis_Damage_Message: {0} has suffered permanent damage to {1} {2} due to an advanced {3} infection.
